    • Method Detail

      • map

        public static final double map(double value,
                               double dataMin,
                               double dataMax,
                               double plottedMin,
                               double plottedMax)
        Method to calculate the size of the map.
        Parameters:
        value - The data of year or subscription.
        dataMin - The minimum value of the data.
        dataMax - The maximum value of the data
        plottedMin - The minimum value that can draw on the map.
        plottedMax - The maximum value that can draw on the map.
        Returns:
        a double number value of the converted data.
